channel.title: Double-Click Pd's updater (works in windows)
channel.description:
This will give you a fully renamed deob made with factor in seconds, merged with my autodeobber version 1.2 that is unreleased (I found out how to fix the bad class, <3 krichovsky for telling me that JODE can decompile it :D)
just double click doAll.bat, it will output three files:
1. Runescape_BIN_VER.jar (standard class files) 2. Runescape_SRC_VER.jar (standard java files (like waffen's deobs)) 3. rsRenamed_VER.jar (java files renamed with factor)
the reason I am not releasing this to the public is because there is one requirement, you must have cygwin installed, and have the cygwin\bin folder in your system path, I dont feel like explaining this to the noobs so I wont, if you cant figure it out, google it ;) :D
http://moparisthebest.com/downloads/doAllFactor.rar

item.title: Double-Click Pd's updater (works in windows)
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

I started with the batch files, but then couldn't be bothered, Compile.bat is included for each directory, Compile.bat in the main directory calls all the others, there's run.bat in each directory, I just cbf'd to change the main run.bat that does everything

Read full topic

item.title: Double-Click Pd's updater (works in windows)
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Nerice:

Was thinking to rename the unrenamed stuff to unknowns... that way everything would be the same. unknownMethod1 etc... for the methods, vars etc...

Then can update, do a dif, and see the changes they made. Will wiat until they change thier stuff though to make sure its not just a waste of time (which I am expecting it to be).

simple!!! order the methods according to number of lines then use compare it. ???

Read full topic

item.title: Double-Click Pd's updater (works in windows)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I was going to include cygwin, but I found I cant split much at all out of it, and didnt want to include 15mb more or so

I may look into what else I can do some other day, but I have a physics final on special relativity in the morning so thats it for tonight
